name: Gaming Delivery Network
author: Gaming Delivery Network

sections.description:
This plugin will add Gaming Delivery Network functionality to your website, including giving you access to add a Contest Wall, or Dynamic Banner to any page or post.

About Us

Gaming Delivery Network is the worlds first and premier provider of an open gaming ecosystem. The ecosystem includes a library of free and for money social games and contests. The ecosystem allows game and contest authors of all kinds to add thier content to the platform, handling all payment processing and user management. The ecosystem also allows for a series of in-site widgets and plugins that site owners can use to integrate and offer games and contests to thier users, creating a great revenue stream while at the same time keeping users on and coming back to thier site (instead of the push-away ads of yester-year).

Come visit us at www.gamingdeliverynetwork.com or contact us at admin@gamingdeliverynetwork.com!
sections.installation:
Installation is easy. You can simply click on install or copy the files over to your ‘/wp-content/plugins/’ directory. Once the plugin is in your plugins directory follow these steps:

  1. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress.
  2. Click on the ‘Gaming Delivery Network’ Admin Menu
  3. Enter in your Access Token. This will be your gamingdeliverynetwork.com or bestdamnpools.com username. If you do not have your username/accesstoken, please go to www.bestdamnpools.com to sign up for one. Its fast and free – and most importantly without it we wont know where to send you your earnings!
  4. Create or Edit a Page or Post and simply click on the Wall Button to add a Contest Wall. Thats it!
sections.faq: If you have any questions, please contact us at admin@gamingdeliverynetwork.com. Thanks!
sections.changelog:
1.0

  • Intitial Release. Please let us know of any issues. We are working hard to support all of our partners and users!
